profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Island Park, Nassau County, N.Y., February 22, 1982; graduated from Chaminade High School, Mineola, N.Y., 2000; B.A., Hofstra University, Hempstead, N.Y., 2004; police detective; fire fighter; member of the Hempstead, N.Y., town council, 2016-2023; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-January 3, 2025); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress in 2024.

asset.name: D000632_001
asset.creditLine: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives
